body.para: The bibletool is atranslation tool that helps churches with people of more than one language.
With entering book names and verses of one main language and choosing one or more language, the program will generate mainly pdf files for easy to use.
Text files .txt are provided in the txt folder for copying and pasting it somewher in a easy manner.
HTML files are saved for the program to generate the pdf, but they could be further used for web pages.
